title: [IN-GAME][VISUAL] Nocturne's tail disappears forever after using Alt-TAB
body:
This bug occurs on the classic & Frozen Terror skin, didn't check the rest because I don't own them.

The following images show Nocturne's tail before & after Alt-Tab'ing.

replies.body:
Hey SpiritController! 

Thanks for the report! We can check his other skins - thanks for taking the time to run through his base and Frozen Terror. We'll see why his trail is going MIA.
I KNEW I WASNT THE ONLY ONE
Wondered what caused that, not an isolated problem.
What will Team Rocket tear off and sell to hungry tourists next? Sickening...
